dcterms:description: A full-time multi-modality benchmark containing 1500 well-registered infrared and visible image pairs with 15 annotated pixel-level categories, covering a wide range of pixel variations and various severe environments, such as dense fog, heavy rain, and low-light conditions.
dcterms:title: FMB

dcterms:description: A dataset aimed at real-time semantic segmentation for autonomous vehicles using multi-spectral scenes.

dcterms:description: A dataset for RGB-thermal calibration, segmentation network, and evaluation of segmentation performance.
